channel.title: Funk and Beyond
channel.description: Carefully constructed segmets of funk, soul, jazz, disco, hip-hop, afro, brazilian beats, breaks and other things we like
channel.itunes:summary: Funk & Beyond by Anatoly Ice. Carefully constructed segments of the funk 45s, soul tracks, hip-hop beats, breaks, afro, latin and brazilian grooves
channel.itunes:author: Anatoly Ice
channel.itunes:subtitle: it's funky right here
channel.itunes:keywords: funk, soul, disco, 70s, 80s, hip-hop, jazz, beats, breaks

item.title: Функции Фанка podcast. Mr. Dirty Hairy Yugo Funk guest mix
item.dc:creator: Ice
item.description: путешествие сквозь фанк, соул, джаз и блюз из США, англии, Италии, Франции, Японии, Индии, Польши и Чехословакии. а также гостевой микс из Югославской Музыки 60х-70х годов от хорватского диджея и подюсера Mr. Dirty Hairy
item.itunes:keywords: funk, soul, library, podcast, breaks, polish, Muza, yugo, dirty, hairy, rare, groove, anatoly ice, ÑÑÐ½ÐºÑÐ¸Ð¸ ÑÐ°Ð½ÐºÐ°
item.itunes:subtitle: Funk and Beyond podcast. Issue 65. Mr. Dirty Hairy Yugo Funk guest mix
item.itunes:summary: A journey through the beats and breaks from all around the world including USA, Japan, Czech, Poland, France, Italy and many others. Second part of the show is a guest mix from Croatian Mr. Dirty hairy with amazing mix of Yugoslavian rare groove music aka Yugo Funk. For more info and tracklisting, please visit anatolyice.ru
item.itunes:author: Anatoly Ice

item.title: Функции Фанка podcast. James Brown Special
item.dc:creator: Ice
item.description: Очередной выпуск подготовленный ко дню рождения Джеймса Брауна. двух часовой трибьют его твочеству. Классика конца 60х - середины 70х.
item.itunes:keywords: funk, soul, james brown, podcast, breaks, rare, groove, anatoly ice, tribute, ÑÑÐ½ÐºÑÐ¸Ð¸ ÑÐ°Ð½ÐºÐ°
item.itunes:subtitle: Funk and Beyond podcast. Issue 64. James Brown Special
item.itunes:summary: James Brown tribute show. 2 hours of James Brown classic material from late 60s to mid 70s. Dedicated to 81th Birthday of one and only Mister Dynamite. for tracklist please visit anatolyice.ru
item.itunes:author: Anatoly Ice

item.title: Функции Фанка podcast. The Girl From Hong Kong
item.dc:creator: Ice
item.description: классика и раритеты соул, фанк и диско музыки в первой части программы и микс от немца Sygaire, посвященный последнему релизу лейбла Black Pearl - пластинке “Das Mädchen von Hongkong” / “The Girl from Hongkong”
item.itunes:keywords: funk, soul, library, podcast, breaks, latin, rare, groove, sygaire, black pearl, anatoly ice, ÑÑÐ½ÐºÑÐ¸Ð¸ ÑÐ°Ð½ÐºÐ°
item.itunes:subtitle: Funk and Beyond podcast. Issue 63. The Girl From Hong Kong
item.itunes:summary: First part of the podcast is mixture of soul, funk and disco tracks from early to late 70s. Some rare stuff and some classics. Second hour - guest mix by Roskow Kretschmann aka Sygaire dedicated to recent release of Black Pearl records - The Girl From Hong Kong OST
item.itunes:author: Anatoly Ice

item.title: Функции Фанка podcast. Blaxploitation Special
item.dc:creator: Ice
item.description: два часа музыки из фильмов, посвящённых тематике Blaxploitation. Классика и редкие записи из моей коллекции саундтреков к американским фильмам 70х.
item.itunes:keywords: funk, soul, blaxploitation, podcast, breaks,, rare, groove, anatoly ice, ÑÑÐ½ÐºÑÐ¸Ð¸ ÑÐ°Ð½ÐºÐ°
item.itunes:subtitle: Funk and Beyond podcast. Issue 62. Blaxploitation Special
item.itunes:summary: A journey through 70s blaxploitation soundtracks. Some classic, some rare and even couple unreleased tunes. For full tracklisting please visit anatolyice.ru
item.itunes:author: Anatoly Ice

item.title: Функции Фанка podcast. The Beatnuts special
item.dc:creator: Ice
item.description: Выпуск, посвящённый грядущему концерту The Beatnuts в Москве. Инструментальная музыка коллектива, замиксованная вместе с музыкой 60-70х годов, которую The Beatnuts сэмплировали в своих вещах.
item.itunes:keywords: funk, soul, hip-hop, beatnuts, instrumental, downtempo, rare, groove, anatoly ice, beyond, ÑÑÐ½ÐºÑÐ¸Ð¸ ÑÐ°Ð½ÐºÐ°
item.itunes:subtitle: Funk and Beyond podcast. Issue 61. The Beatnuts special
item.itunes:summary:
Issue dedicated to forthcoming show of the famous Beatnuts duo, who comes to Moscow on 5th of March 2014. Mostly instrumental beats of The Beatnuts productions with some funk, soul and jazz tracks sampled in their music. For the intro I've played some downtempo grooves, which I am usualy playing while warming up such acts.
For tracklisting please visit anatolyice.ru website
item.itunes:author: Anatoly Ice

item.title: Функции Фанка podcast. P.C. Guest Mix
item.dc:creator: Ice
item.description: очередной выпуск подкаста, посвящённый инструментальной и library музыке 70х, а также гостевой микс от Патрика Карпентера (P.C.)
item.itunes:keywords: funk, soul, library, podcast, breaks, latin, rare, groove, anatoly ice, ÑÑÐ½ÐºÑÐ¸Ð¸ ÑÐ°Ð½ÐºÐ°
item.itunes:subtitle: Funk and Beyond podcast. Issue 60. PC Guest Mix
item.itunes:summary:
Mostly instrumental funk, jazz, rock music from 70s and Introduction to Library music in first part of the show and guest mix from PC (Cinematic Orchestra.UK) in second part.
1 part: 1. Nicolas Flagello - Wailing Wail [Emperor Norton 2000] 2. Sydney Dale - Knock On Wood [Impress] 3. Gianfranco Plenizio - Grigio Perla [Beat Records] 4. Olympic Runners - Keep It Up [RCA] 5. Danny Edwardson - Electric Blue [KPM] 6. The Advancement - Stone Folk [Philips] 7. Johnny Pearson - Product Efficiency [KPM] 8. Ann Alford - Gotta Get Me A Job [Hy Sign] 9. James Nixon - Boogie Bones [Chess] 10. Cleavelend Eaton and The Kats - It's Mookie Time [Cle An Thair] 11. The Generation Gap - Rock Steady [RCA] 12. New Visions - Skinny Dip [Dare-Dare] 13. Los Chorbos - Sones Del Chicharro [CBS] 14. Piet Van Meren - Mr. Buzz [Bosworth] 15. Chute Libre - Jerba [EMI] 16. City News - Bustin' Up [Brother] 17. Keith Mansfield - man Alive [KPM] 18. Wendell Harrison - Farewell To The Welfare [Tribe] 19. Brian Bennett - Bop On The Rocks [KPM] 20. Ahmad Jamal - Boatride [20th Century]
2 part: PC in The Mix (no tracklisting)
item.itunes:author: Anatoly Ice

item.title: Функции Фанка podcast. The Best from 2013
item.dc:creator: Ice
item.description: обзор альбомов, вышедших в свет в уходящем 2013ом. всё что было связано с фанк, соул и джаз музыкой.
item.itunes:keywords: funk, jazz, soul, disco, hip-hop, house, nu funk, nu jazz, best, 2013, anatoly ice, beyond
item.itunes:subtitle: Funk and Beyond podcast. The Best From 2013
item.itunes:summary: new issue of podcast dedicated to new funkalicious albums which were released during 2013.
item.itunes:author: Anatoly Ice

item.title: Функции Фанка podcast
item.dc:creator: Ice
item.description: очередной выпуск подкаста. два часа музыки второй половины семидесятых - начала восьмидесятых. раннее диско, модерн соул, фанк, хип-хоп и немного африканских и латино американских ритмов
item.itunes:keywords: funk, soul, disco, hip-hop, rare, groove, anatoly ice, beyond, ÑÑÐ½ÐºÑÐ¸Ð¸ ÑÐ°Ð½ÐºÐ°
item.itunes:subtitle: Funk and Beyond podcast. Issue 58
item.itunes:summary: 58th issue of Funk and Beyond Podcast is dedicated to late 70s and early 80s sounds. 2 hours of funk, soul, disco, modern soul and some afro-latin rhythms
item.itunes:author: Anatoly Ice
